4.stageName: The End of Old fishing pier

8.stageName: Mystic Hollow Tavern Keeper (Consumable Item Vendor)

QUEST_HINT.text:
Throughout the game, you will be completing quests. For each completed quest, you will receive a reward.
	Each quest can have multiple Quest Objectives that you need to fulfill to complete the quest.
	Available quests will be marked with a yellow exclamation point ( - ! - ),
	while completed but not yet turned in quests will be marked with a yellow question mark ( - ? - ).
	You may also encounter a gray exclamation point, indicating that you have not yet met the requirements
	to accept that quest (insufficient level, need to complete a prerequisite quest).

BLACKSMITH_HINT.text:
- You can dismantle wearable item. This will destroy item,
	but you get crafting reagents (items),
		- You can refinement wearable item. This will increase item
	price and ability bonus, For refinement item you need crafting reagents (items)

LOCATION_HINT.text:
Welcome to the location. The Location consists of multiple stages.
	If a stage is not open from the beginning, you can only access it after completing the previous stage.
	To enter some stages, you need an item to unlock the stage.

NEW_SPELL_HINT.text:
Here you can learn a new spells. You can learn one new spell on levels 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5.
	When you want to change a learned spell, simply learn a new one, and the old one will be unlearned.

HERO_MENU.text:
In the hero menu, you can view your statistics, inventory, add or subtract ability points
	check accepted and completed quests, learn new spells, and adjust game settings.

REGION_HINT.text:
Welcome to the region. Here you can travel across the region, discover new locations, and complete quests.
	However, be cautious of traps while traveling through locations.

BATTLE_HINT.text:
One of the most important parts of the game are the battles. Battles occur in turns.
	Combat is conducted using spells, each spell has actions that are performed after using the spell.
	Actions with durations are performed after of the turn of character affected by Action, Except action Stun, which is performed right after the spell is casted.
	However, be careful, some actions do not have a 100% chance of execution.
	If action has lower chance to perform, you will see percentage chance in action description.
	Spells on CoolDowns can't be used.
	To receive rewards or fulfill Quest Objectives, you must defeat all units and win the battle.

WELCOME.text:
Hello, my name is Stefan, and I am creator of this game.
	I will guide you through the game for a short time.
	If you find the slow text print bothersome, you can disable it in the game settings.
	I hope you will enjoy the game! Good luck with exploring the world of Eldarion!
